*Heather* watched as she swirled around in the dust, her eyes glaring up at the falling shards as if entranced by them, she swirled and twurled around like a kid dancing in the rain, the only object tempting her eyes away was that of herself. A reflection casted in a mirror nearby.

*Heather* could not help but strike a pose, watching as the remains cascaded her... her grin forming once more, as her hands brushed up unto her sides, cupping each and every one off her curves before reaching up to her ample bossom, being sure to give *her* new tits a good squeeze, after all... she would need to get used to *her* body...

info.brief_description: Sean, a teenage boy, gets tons of powers that lead to lots of fun. Full summary inside!
info.description:
Ok heres how this works. Sean gets any powers you want to give him basically (i.e. MC, possess, clothes possession, turning into water, sending clones into others etc.). Feel free to add powers (one or two at a time) as the story moves along. that way much later down one arc of the story he will have plenty of powers at once.

Also I don't care what you add into the story, but there are some things i personally would like/not like to see.

LIKE: Try not to add too many characters as that only adds confusion. Just not a whole school.

NOPE: not saying you cant, but try to keep gay stuff to a minimum. Lesbians welcome. Double standards are fun!

LATER in the story you can throw some powers to other people, but I'd like to keep the focus on Sean for a while.

Go to town with it. I would love to watch the world burn, or be saved or whatever.

*gets down on knees* PLEASE DO NOT have a chapter just to say, 'how would you do it' or 'who is it'. I don't want to watch my story get bogged down for 50 chapters while we cycle through characters or celebrities one person at a time. HAVE MULTIPLE CHOICES, or just pick one and write about it.

a chapter over *gasp* 100 words will earn you a pat on the back.

a chapter over *whole audience gasps* 500 words and i will give you a super power in real life... as soon as i get the process down.


CHARACTERS

Sean- main character, 17, of the male gender.

Heather- mom, blonde 42

Jack- dad 42

Amanda- girlfriend 17

Amelia- younger sister, 13

Kristen- Older sister, 20

Not much description on anyone because like I said before, you can do whatever you want. Have fun!

HAVE FUN!
